name: bj-exalimsi
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: mpg(s0, wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), w2)), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), w2)))
-| wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(wn(w2), wal(s0, wn(w2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(wex(s0, w0), wi(wn(w2), wal(s0, wn(w2))))

comment: An inference for distributing quantifiers over a double implication. (Almost) the general statement that ~ spimfw proves. (Contributed by BJ, 29-Sep-2019.)
